title: Understanding Ideal Body Weight
text: Ideal body weight is often defined as the weight associated with the lowest mortality risk. It is not necessarily the weight that a person desires or a specific BMI value.

hintAnswer: height and weight with the lowest risk for mortality
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes the ideal body weight?
choices: height and weight with the lowest risk for mortality
body weight that achieves BMI of $$25$$
